definition: in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
near/approaching/to depend on/(slang) to have an intimate relationship with sb/Taiwan pr. [pang2], [bang1], [bang4]

sentences.english: It is the custom here to take a cold shower every evening in summer.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天每天傍晚洗冷水浴是這裏的習俗。

sentences.english: Saved the meteorological observatory evening to issue the Zhejiang coastal area strong typhoon urgent alarm yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 省氣象臺昨天傍晚發佈浙江沿海地區強颱風緊急警報。

sentences.english: Evening return to Kota Kinabalu hotel.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚回返亞庇市酒店休息。

sentences.english: A small street in Annecy, France, in late afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚時分，法國安娜西的一條小街。

sentences.english: Every day from 5 to 7 pm, we go out and row on the Charles River.
sentences.chinese: 每天傍晚五點到七點，我們都會去查爾斯河上劃賽艇。

sentences.english: One evening he came to the gate of a city and tried to enter.
sentences.chinese: 一天傍晚，他來到一座城門口想要進去。

sentences.english: Moisturize your face in the morning and evening with natural oils.
sentences.chinese: 潤肺你的臉在早上和傍晚天然油脂。

sentences.english: Whenever the evening, I would climb the roof to watch sunset.
sentences.chinese: 每當傍晚，我都會爬上房頂去觀看晚霞。

sentences.english: Moritz on the right, like everyone else, was enjoying the evening.
sentences.chinese: 莫里茨的權利，其他人一樣，享受傍晚。

sentences.english: The headman brought all the villagers home in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚，大臣帶着村民返回村裏。

sentences.english: A stylish couple walking through Ueno Park in Tokyo during sunset.
sentences.chinese: 一對時髦的夫妻傍晚時分穿過東京上野公園。

sentences.english: Watching the sun go down is a nice little sunset date .
sentences.chinese: 在傍晚看落日西沉是一個不錯的方式。

sentences.english: Einstein and Besso walk slowly down Speichergasse in the late afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚，愛因斯坦和貝索順斯帕雪街慢慢走着。

sentences.english: It is late afternoon now. After a busy day.
sentences.chinese: 喧囂一天過後，傍晚的包河靜如圖畫。

sentences.english: Our army is attacking the enemy, and hopefully will defeat them by late afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 軍發起進擊，有望在傍晚將其擊退。

sentences.english: So enjoy that extra hour of sunlight in the evening. Carefully.
sentences.chinese: 因此，盡情享受傍晚那一個小時額外的陽光吧。

definition: time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
